Description: More than 120 Congolese fighters have been disarmed in Rwanda, the Rwandan army said, as a Kigali-backed armed group entered the Goma, a key city in DRC's perennially restive east. The post Rwanda Army Says 120 Congolese Fighters ‘Disarmed’ appeared first on The Defense Post.

Title: Trump Suggests US Releasing 2,000-Pound Bombs to Israel
Description: Donald Trump said Saturday that a 'lot of things' ordered by Israel were now being delivered, following a report that the US president had released a hold on the provision of 2,000-pound bombs. The post Trump Suggests US Releasing 2,000-Pound Bombs to Israel appeared first on The Defense Post.

Description: Babcock and Patria have signed an agreement to jointly offer the Patria 6×6 Armoured Personnel Carrier to the UK Armed Forces. The post Patria, Babcock Jointly Offer Armored Carrier to British Army appeared first on The Defense Post.

Description: Ukraine’s armed forces will receive an additional 2.5 billion hryvnia (nearly $60 million) to directly purchase drones. The post Ukraine Military to Get Addt’l $60M Monthly Budget for New Drones appeared first on The Defense Post.

Title: US Army Orders Over 100 Heavy Dump Trucks From Mack Defense
Description: The US Army has placed an additional order of 103 M917A3 Heavy Dump Trucks (HDTs) from Mack Defense, a company under the Volvo Group based in Sweden. The post US Army Orders Over 100 Heavy Dump Trucks From Mack Defense appeared first on The Defense Post.

Title: Romania to Acquire 150 Piranha Combat Vehicles in 2025
Description: Romania’s Ministry of Defence plans to purchase 150 more Piranha 5 8x8 infantry fighting vehicles for the armed forces later this year. The post Romania to Acquire 150 Piranha Combat Vehicles in 2025 appeared first on The Defense Post.
